column5: Just wanted to pass along some saving to my friends here. I have not been posting much but still check in and see what is going on with everyone. If you come out to the show please stop by the Handlebarz booth and say Hi and see what has kept myself off the internet so much over the last few years.  Cheers Mike  Print off this coupon to save $2.00 on admission to the Spring Fishing and Boat show.
Thanks Mike, much appreciated and see you there... if you have a few decals L would like 3 or 4 for the truck
Thanks for the saving . I just printed a couple of coupons off. I will be stopping at your booth.
Great idea to take the wife for valentines day!
There's a man with his priorities in order
What should we expecting at this years Spring Fishing and Boat Show?
Hey Mike  Are you going to have lots of the bump boards this year? I know last year you ran out of them
